name: Sunset Mini Golf (PROTOTYPE)
description:
Sunset Mini Golf is a prototype that I've been working on that only uses 1 button to play. I wanted to make the game easy to learn and enjoyable to play. I hope you enjoy the game and let me know what you think!

CONTROLS

RMB - hold to charge and release to go!

CREDITS

SFX - Freesound.org

Music - OpenGameArt.org

Textures - CC0Textures.com
